resources.string: "Paddle tennis is a very popular ball sport that is rapidly expanding with millions of players around the world. Its origin is set in Mexico in the 70s and its game system is very similar to tennis, although with a much smaller court surrounded by four walls. "

"This application has been made with the purpose of being evaluated in the first installment of the Advanced Software Development subject. The Padel theme was implemented because the creator of this application is a fan of this sport. "
